TopicTitle: My eve mission: To Eve and Back

Articles.Content:
I've been working on this little mission for the few inconsecutive hours I have in my free time. I made this for the Eve Rocks challenge (check my sig for more info) , where the hardest difficulty was landing on eve without parachutes, landing gear, all under 500m; I even had to get a soil sample and a water sample. Apart of that, I think I'm going into real solar system now, until the next update.

Edited January 31, 2015 by manni01
